content:
If you're not aware, @Vera Clemens gave an excellent presentation on Monday of the The German Central Health Study Hub https://csh.nfdi4health.de during the #ui-dev meeting.

She touched on a number of container-related topics including Kubernetes, Helm charts, auth, and probably more I'm forgetting.

You can find the recording and slides at https://ui.gdcc.io but here are direct links:

https://harvard.zoom.us/rec/share/ADr5f33FfcAFTMwQkxw3gy1Jxc9hr9VWYDr6vu6l-XQHG0C1ebaFah5h65js8FuR.Vnn-nM_7me_5a8Sy

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sKpfvkAh73HzQT6CObmZJ93H6hvAgi_2/view?usp=drive_link
